name: botbuilder-core
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Core components for Microsoft Bot Builder. Components in this library can run either in a browser or on the server.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder .\lib\index.d.ts ..\botbuilder-core\lib\index.d.ts ..\botframework-schema\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK" --readme none
scripts.build:rollup: yarn clean && yarn build && api-extractor run --verbose --local
